index.description: The corresponding index to this level.

exertion_threshold.description: The Threshold of exertion that considers this level.

sway_multiplier_scoped.description: Multiplier to sway when scoped, changing its magnitude

sway_multiplier_thirdperson.description: Multiplier to sway when in thirdperson, changing its magnitude

sway_frequency_multiplier_scoped.description: Multiplier to sway when scoped, changing its frequency

sway_frequency_multiplier_thirdperson.description: Multiplier to sway when in thirdperson, changing its frequency

sway_recoil_multiplier_scoped.description: Multiplier to sway when scoped, changing its recoil

sway_recoil_multiplier_thirdperson.description: Multiplier to sway when in thirdperson, changing its recoil

sway_interp_speed.description: The interpolation speed used for all sway values

enter_animation_event.description: [string]The animation event to play when entering this exertion level.

exit_animation_event.description: [string]The animation event to play when exiting this exertion level.
